product_description: This cider, blended with single malt scotch whisky casks. Warming notes of oak, vanilla and honey.
This clear cider, fermented mainly from desert fruit, blended with traditional mango.
A straw coloured hazy cider, Em Tetley's favoured tipple.
This clear golden traditional cider from desert apples, blended with pear. Strong.
This strong, clear and very drinkable cider, with a crisp refreshing taste and little evidence of alcoholic content.
This clear deep red cider is sweet and tangy, bursting with a luscious blend of cherry flavours and a Bakewell tart hint.
This medium real apple cider is infused with tart rhubarb and blended with vanilla, resulting in a pleasing, smooth and complex flavour.
This sweet cider is infused with tart raspberry and rippled through with vanilla, resulting in a distinctive fruity flavour and smooth character, with emerging vanilla notes in the finish.
This traditional cloudy cider has a light and refreshing character, with a tremendously fruity flavour and a distinctive bite in the finish.
This cloudy, still, medium-dry cider is made using Dabinett and Tremlettâ€™s Bitter apples, two classic west country varieties, which help to create a robust and rich farmhouse-style character.
